meanings.sent1: I accidentally overwatered my flowers, and now they look sad.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to overwater your plants, as it can harm them.
meanings.sent3: The overwatering of the cactus led to it feeling like it was drowning.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like overwatering a delicate flower, suffocating it with too much attention.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of overwatering can be devastating, causing the roots to rot and the plant to wither.

meanings.definition: The act of giving too much water to a plant.
meanings.sent1: Overwatering can be harmful to plants if done regularly.
meanings.sent2: Excessive overwatering may lead to root rot in your garden.
meanings.sent3: The overwatering of the succulent turned it into a waterlogged sponge.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, overwatering is like drowning them in kindness.
meanings.sent5: The visible effects of overwatering are wilting leaves and a droopy appearance in the plant.
